Potli Massage Therapy is an ancient Ayurvedic technique that involves the use of heated herbal poultices, also known as "potlis." These potlis are filled with a combination of specific herbs, oils, and spices that are carefully chosen based on your individual needs and health goals. The heated potlis are applied to specific points on your body to provide targeted therapeutic effects. How Does Potli Massage Therapy Work? During a Potli Massage Therapy session at Nirvana Naturopathy, our experienced therapists will skillfully massage your body using the heated potlis. The heat from the potlis helps to relax your muscles, improve blood circulation, and promote the release of toxins from your body. The therapeutic herbs and oils in the potlis are absorbed through your skin, allowing their healing properties to penetrate deep into your tissues. Benefits of Potli Massage Therapy: 1.
